body:
Comment 2: 
Hi Brad,

Could you attach some screenshots? I just tried with my phone and it looks OK.
I admit that the text looks small on portrait orientation, but landscape looks good.

See my screenshots attached:
Attachments: 1. Screenshot_2014-05-12-11-34-35.png (123145 bytes) 1. Screenshot_2014-05-12-11-34-39.png (191666 bytes)
